lead_paragraph: With a victory against 16th-seeded David Ferrer, the first man into the quarterfinals of this year's Australian Open on Sunday was the unseeded Mardy Fish, who will face his childhood housemate Andy Roddick.
snippet: With a victory against 16th-seeded David Ferrer, the first man into the quarterfinals of this year's Australian Open on Sunday was the unseeded Mardy Fish, who will face his childhood housemate Andy Roddick.
